Reachy 2 Dual Arm + Mobile Base.text:
WHAT: A compact, modular robot arm with dual reach and precision.
CATEGORY: Industrial automation equipment.
FEATURES: 7 DOFs, 3 kg lifting capacity, seamless AI integration.
CAPABILITIES: Human-like arm movements, advanced machine learning support.
USERS: Industrial automation professionals.
Markets: Manufacturing, logistics, robotics.
LIMITATIONS: Requires a mobile base for extended use.
NOTE: Available with or without a mobile base.
